vendor

Class Vendor

  • java.lang.Object
    • vendor.Vendor

  • public class Vendor
extends java.lang.Object
    Where the vendor is created, purchases are made and items are added to inventory.

    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • buyItem

        public boolean buyItem(java.lang.String item)
        Handles the item purchases by adding the specified item to the players inventory and subtracts the cost from the players currency
        Parameters:
        name - - name of item the player buys
        Returns:
        true - if the player where able to buy item otherwise false

        Returns:
